actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Rice Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Minn., and the entire Mille Lacs National Wildlife Refuge, Minn., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Rice Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Minnesota, and the entire Mille Lacs National Wildlife Refuge, Minnesota, as the Mille Lacs and Rice Lake Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Rice Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Minn., and the entire Mille Lacs National Wildlife Refuge, Minn., as wilderness.
